ygData.subject: Re: Fortuneteller arrives
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC:  Hey, I kinda like the idea of Organics potentally altering history with a child.  Very interesting, I shall entertain the idea. IC: Organics: The tall

OOC:  Hey, I kinda like the idea of Organics potentally altering history with a child.  Very interesting, I shall entertain the idea.
 
IC:
Organics:
The tall and graceful form of the valkyrie stirred, a transmission disupted her sleep cycle.  Organics stirred and slowly set up, replaying the transmission.  Realizing the danger, she scrambled out of her quarters after she grabbed her shield and sword and ran to the command area.  She franticly searched the consoles for the shield controls.  Finally finding them, she dropped the shields and dashed outside.  She spotted the striken craft and then jumped into action. She flew into the air then tansformed into her space fighter mode and flew to help the shuttle correct it's course.

Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...> wrote:
Fortuneteller�s shuttle raced towards earth. She
laid within the small sleek craft, barely large enough
for her slender form, and light equipment. In one
hand she held her staff, she preferred to use it as a
melee weapon, but it was quite capable of delivering
energy blasts of moderate power. In her other hand
she held twenty bolts. They were her power, by how
they fell she could see the future to some extent. 
She was nothing to compare with Seer, Ex, her beloved
Deus, or even Machina, but she had some skill, and had
stolen some destiny energy.

She blew on the bolts, and asked them, �What is so
important about this �Organics�, why does the destiny
energy settle about her so. She threw them, and saw
many patterns gather. Most of them were indistinct,
representing the chaotic course of destiny, but one
was quite clear, one bolt laying against another, and
a third before them.

�A potential child,� chuckled Fortuneteller, �well
I�ll soon put a stop to that.� She whispered to the
bolts again �Who is the father?�

The bolts were once again unclear, showing four
separate possible candidates, but one was most
distinct, taking ten bolts in his pattern. His bolts
were chaotic, mad, but still of one pattern.

Finally she asked her final questions of the bolts,
�What is so special about this child?� She gasped at
the final pattern. The bolts were quite clear this
time, while even without her there was no assurance
the child would exist, beyond the child one future
dominated seventeen of the bolts, and the other three
lay scattered, in un-formed future. The possible
timeline she would be stealing for the Deviners uses
would be a very different one indeed. In fear of
loosing the child the mother would put it onboard the
Ark in stasis, even putting his spark within an
Autobot body. When the child awakened HE, not Optimus
Prime would become the leader of the Autobots. 
Through some odd device the mother would both allow
his spark to mature over the eons, and erase all
possible memory of his former life. Under his
guidance the Great War would be a massacre of
Decepticons, a future in which only the Maximals
existed. Her son would be the most ruthless, and
brilliant transformer ever to draw energon, but such a
great leader he would have no need of the Matrix. If
she read them right he even discovered some way to
destroy Unicron without opening it!

Deus would reward her for this. She thought of her
precious Deus, and knew as always he was just using
her. She looked at her reflection in the forward
shuttle window. She wasn�t old, but worn with the
fading beauty of mid-life. Deus was perhaps older
than she, but his destiny energy kept him looking ten
cycles younger. Still, she was his to command, and
she would do as he bid, even to her own death.

She aimed her shuttle at the place where she sensed
her pray, slightly beside the Maximal Base, but still
within their shields. She sent out a distress signal,
�HELLO! UNKNOWN BASE DO YOU COPY! I�M OUT OF
CONTROL AND I WILL HIT YOUR SHIELDS IF YOU DO NOT
LOWER THEM! HURRY!�

OOC: All that she envisioned was just a possible
future, don�t think I�m forcing anyone into anything
(for that matter I�m still waiting on the council to
tell me the restrictions on the Deviners).
		
---------------------------------
